locations.name: Low Rent Housing Project
locations.description: This low rent housing project has small rooms and smaller kitchens and looks newly renovated

locations.name: Wizards of the Coast
locations.description: This magical items store ha the latest and greatest magic infused items and has extreme security protocols.

locations.name: Blade & Bust
locations.description: This melee weapon store has restricted and military-grade equipment, but only sells to licensed individuals and is a front for criminal activity

locations.name: A sanctuary for the followers of the Song of the Spheres (Desna)
locations.description: This place of worship has its walls adorned by a butterfly with stars, suns, and moons on its wings.

locations.name: Metal, Carbon, and Plastics Surgery
locations.description: This augmentations clinic has 10 different types of knee joints and has very unpleasent climate control.

locations.name: Solid States
locations.description: This electronics workshop is very popular among the aging population and is constructed from plastic.

locations.name: The Sleeping Halfling
locations.description: This speakeasy is the seediest place in this quadrant and was constructed by nanites.

locations.name: Munitions Mega Store
locations.description: This armory stocks all manner of combat items, from armor to ammunition and smells like cookies on the inside.

locations.name: Body Recyclers
locations.description: This augmentations clinic specializes in biotech and seems to be well guarded.
